item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Backstreet Boys - Backstreet Boys (1996 UK Special Edition) + 5 Era Singles
item.description:
The Backstreet Boys released their first eponymous album in Germany on May 6, 1996, on Jive Records. It was an immediate success, with all five singles released from the LP -- "We've Got It Goin' On," "I'll Never Break Your Heart," "Get Down (You're the One for Me)," "Quit Playing Games (With My Heart)," and "Anywhere for You" -- all charting in the top 5 of the Official GfK (Germany) Chart (with "Quit Playing Games" ultimately going to no. 1).

Following releases of the album in other European territories, a Special Edition version of the album with three new songs was released later that year.

Also included in this download are FLAC rips of five imported singles from Germany: "We've Got It Goin' On," "I'll Never Break Your Heart," "Get Down (You're the One for Me)," "Quit Playing Games (With My Heart)," and "Anywhere for You," and a bonus FLAC rip of the rare U.S. "I'll Never Break Your Heart" single.





Backstreet Boys (Special Edition)

1. We've Got It Goin' On
2. Anywhere for You
3. Get Down (You're the One for Me)
4. I'll Never Break Your Heart
5. Quit Playing Games (With My Heart)
6. Boys Will Be Boys
7. Just to Be Close to You
8. I Wanna Be With You
9. Every Time I Close My Eyes
10. Darlin'
11. Let's Have A Party
12. Roll With It
13. Nobody But You
14. Don't Leave Me
15. Give Me Your Heart
16. Lay Down Beside Me

Import Singles



We've Got It Goin' On (Germany CDS)

1. We've Got It' Goin' On
2. We've Got It Goin' On (Hula's House Mix)
3. Get Down (You're the One For Me) (Smokin' Beats Club Mix)
4. Tell Me That I'm Dreamin'

I'll Never Break Your Heart (Germany CDS)

1. I'll Never Break Your Heart
2. Roll With It (Alternate Mix)
Omitted: Mark Goodier Interview, Pt. 2

Get Down (You're the One for Me) (Germany CDS)

1. LP Edit - No Rap
2. DEZIGN Radio 1
3. CL Vocal Journey Radio Edit
4. Markus Plastik Vocal Radio Edit
5. DEZIGN Dub Radio Edit

Quit Playing Games (With My Heart)

1. Quit Playing Games (With My Heart) (LP Version)
2. Nobody But You (Long Version)
3. Give Me Your Heart
4. Quit Playing Games (With My Heart) (Acoustic Version)

Anywhere for You

1. Anywhere for You (LP Version)
2. I'll Never Find Someone Like You
3. Anywhere for You (Spanish Version - Donde Quieras Yo Ire)
4. Happy Valentine

I'll Never Break Your Heart (Rare U.S. Single)

1. I'll Never Break Your Heart (LP Version)
2. I'll Never Break Your Heart (Spanish Version - Nunca Te Hare Llorar)
3. Quit Playing Games (With My Heart) (Live Version)

item.author: JayFantasi
